name: Maneater

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally HP in Dungeons by 33%.

skills.name: Pummel
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 25% [Decrease ATK] debuff on all enemies if this attack is critical.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.name: Syphon
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Fully depletes the target's Turn Meter. Fills this Champion's Turn Meter equal to the amount the target loses.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Ancient Blood
skills.raw_description:
This Champion receives damage, then places an [Unkillable] buff and a [Block Debuffs] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Damage received is equal to 5% MAX HP for each alive ally.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1
